name: 曾德樟
objective:
本課程探討現代通訊的基本原理，內容重點放在類比通訊的調變技巧與雜訊分析，課程大綱包括：
1.Introduction
2.Fundamentals of signal and system analysis
3.Modulation techniques with emphasis on analog systems
4.A brief review of probability theory
5.Stochastic processes
6.Noise effects in analog modulation systems
7.Pulse modulation
schedule:
1.Introduction:(第一週)
(1). The block diagram of a communication system
(2). Channel characteristics
(3). Summary of systems analysis techniques
2.Fundamentals of signal and system analysis:(第二週-第五週)
(1). Signal models and signal classifications
(2). Fourier series and the Fourier transform
(3). Power spectral density and correlation
(4). Signals and linear systems
(5). The Hilbert transform
3.Modulation techniques with emphasis on analog systems:(第六週-第八週)
(1). Linear modulation
(2). Angle modulation
(3). Interference
(4). Feedback demodulators: The phase-locked loop
(5). Multiplexing
4.A brief review of probability theory:(第九週-第十週)
(1). What is Probability?
(2). Random variables and related functions
(3). Statistical averages
(4). Some useful pdfs
5.Stochastic processes:(第十一週-第十二週)
(1). Some terminology of random processes
(2). Correlation and power spectral density
(3). Linear systems and random processes
(4). Narrowband noise
6.Noise effects in analog modulation systems:(第十三週-第十五週)
(1). Signal-to-noise ratios
(2). Noise and phase errors in coherent systems
(3). Noise in angle modulation
(4). Threshold effect in FM demodulation
7.Pulse modulation:(第十六週-第十七週)
(1). Sampling theory
(2). Analog pulse modulation
(3). Pulse-code modulation (PCM) and delta modulation
(4). Noise in PCM system
scorePolicy:
1. 期中考、平時考、期末考與作業。
2. 出席率。
